title: The Quirky and the Charming
overview: By chance, Yi Ran, who had been making ends meet with odd jobs, becomes a professional sleeper at a five-star hotelâ€”only to discover that her new boss, Xiao Mucheng, is the hotel's director and her direct supervisor. As they tackle quirky guests and the hotel's business struggles, Yi Ran and Xiao Mucheng clash but gradually grow closer despite their differences.
